techmeme.title: Microsoft unveils Dragon Copilot, a new voice-activated AI assistant for doctors, combining Dragon Medical One and ambient listening service DAX Copilot (Ashley Capoot/CNBC)
Builder.ai CEO Sachin Dev Duggal says he is stepping down from the London-based startup, which has raised $450M to use AI to develop apps and websites (Alexandra Heal/Financial Times)
Sources: Nvidia and Broadcom are running 18A manufacturing tests with Intel, and AMD is also evaluating whether Intel's 18A process is suitable for its needs (Reuters)
New York-based corporate payments startup Ramp hit a $13B valuation in a $150M share sale to GIC, Stripes, Thrive, and others, up from $7.65B in April 2024 (George Hammond/Financial Times)
Google demos new Gemini features, including Screenshare to let users ask questions based on their phone's screen, and video search, coming later in March 2025 (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
